summary: I'm an international relations professional with a specialisation in rule of law and justice reform. I combine hands-on experience in capacity building projects in Eastern Europe and the Western Balkans with leadership skills that inspire project teams and beneficiaries to take ownership for development and change. I believe that a comprehensive holistic approach involving all actors in a chain is essential for sustainable development. I have a keen eye for the strengths, limitations, ideas and experiences that individual team members bring in and a gift for identifying how people who are different can work together productively. I keep an eye on the bigger picture, spot opportunities and threats swiftly and know how to mobilise my network and my team members to plan actions and find solutions.
